Description.Text: Hotel Bayside Studios is a hotel and allocates 70 double and triple rooms in total. All the rooms allocate a built in wardrobe, full bathroom, telephone, music, air conditioning / heating, safe box and private balcony with view towards to sea or garden.

Hotel Bayside Studios is situated at Kremasti beach, which, accordingly, is found, in the north-west part of the island of Rhodes, precisely 20 metres away from an organised beach, famous for its crystal clear sea, and attractive to all the tourists who visit the island. For those who like windsurfing or kiteboarding the hotel is only 50 meters from kremasti beach ideal for kite board and wind surfing. The airport is only 2 km so it makes it also an airport hotel.
